text: aye hamare parvardiaar main! ne apni kuch aulaad is be kheti ki waadi mein tere hurmath wale ghar ke paas basaayi hai, aye hamare parvardigaar! ye is liye ke wo namaaz qaayam rakhe, pas tu kuch logo ke dilo ko un ki taraf maayel karde aur unhe phalo ki roziya inaayath farma ta ke ye shukr guzaari kare
